com.gdxgame.core

Class GameMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gdxgame.core.GameMenu

  • public abstract class GameMenu
extends Object
    GameMenu is one of the core classes for Label based keyboard menus. It consists of at least one GameMenuPage and each menu page contains the menu options for that page.
    It uses the libgdx Stage class to have a scene graph in the background that contains actors(=the Labels). The stage of the GameMenu class is always a StretchViewport to stretch the menu to the given size.

    A GameMenuPage is configured (=which class defines the page, which skin is used and the page's background image) within the GameMenuPageType enum.

    A Skin is configured within the SkinType enum.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(float deltaTime)
        updates the menu by delta time(=time passed since last frame) by internally calling the active menu page's update method. Also updates the actors of the stage.
        Can be used to f.e. add animations or periodically change a menu value.
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - time passed since last frame

      • render

        public void render(SpriteBatch spriteBatch)
        render the menu by drawing the stage of the menu and calling the active menu page's render method.
        Parameters:
        spriteBatch - reference to the GDXGame SpriteBatch to draw things

      • changeMenuPage

        public void changeMenuPage(GameMenuPageType newPage)
        changes the active menu page to the give menu page type. If the newPage parameter is null then the menu will change to the previous page. Otherwise it will create a new page instance of type newPage and will put it on top of the menu pages stack. The page that is on top of the menu pages stack is the active menu page.

        A GameMenuPage is configured (=which class defines the page, which skin is used and the page's background image) within the GameMenuPageType enum.
        Parameters:
        newPage - page type to get active. null to remove the current page and go back to the previous page

      • increaseSelection

        public void increaseSelection()
        increases the current selected option of the active menu page

      • decreaseSelection

        public void decreaseSelection()
        decreases the current selected option of the active menu page

      • getCurrentOption

        public Label getCurrentOption()
        returns the current selected option (=Label) of the active menu page
        Returns:
        current selected Label of active menu page

      • getCurrentPage

        public GameMenuPage getCurrentPage()
        returns the current active game menu page
        Returns:
        active menu page

      • processSelection

        public void processSelection()
        processes the current selected option by forwarding the call to the active menu page's GameMenuPage.processSelection(int) method

      • keyDown

        public boolean keyDown(int keyCode)
        handles keyboard's keyDown events by forwarding the call to the active menu page. The mapping between controller buttons and keyboard buttons should happen already before this call in the GameStateLogic logic.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - code of pressed key
        Returns:
        true when event was successfully handled. false otherwise.

      • keyUp

        public boolean keyUp(int keyCode)
        handles keyboard's keyUp events by forwarding the call to the active menu page. The mapping between controller buttons and keyboard buttons should happen already before this call in the GameStateLogic logic.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - code of released key
        Returns:
        true when event was successfully handled. false otherwise.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        disposes any resources of the game menu (f.e. the stage).
